After being listed questionable and then playing, he was absent for a recent game for "personal reasons," with coaches reportedly unaware of his whereabouts. The team is navigating the situation while fans and teammates express worry for the young player's well-being.

Dana White’s favour for Ronda Rousey resurfaces; fans call it unfair to McGregor
description: UFC President Dana White granted Ronda Rousey a rare media exemption for her 2016 comeback fight, a privilege not even afforded to Conor McGregor. Despite this special treatment, Rousey suffered a swift defeat to Amanda Nunes, marking her final UFC bout. Rumors of a potential 2026 return persist, though unconfirmed.

AI can plan your trip, but Indians still trust people more: Qlik report

Instagram’s new Restyle feature lets you add festive Diwali effects to photos, videos
'Double standards': MEA slams UK sanctions on Indian firm; curbs over Russian oil
description: India has strongly rebuffed the UK's new sanctions on Russia's oil sector and Indian firms, asserting its commitment to energy security and warning against "double standards" in global trade. New Delhi reiterated its non-recognition of unilateral sanctions, emphasising the paramount importance of meeting citizens' basic energy needs. The UK's move targeted Russian oil exports and entities, including India's Nayara Energy.

Two arrested over Zubeen protests in Assam’s Baksa
Donald Trump says PM Modi has committed to tapering off Russian oil purchases
description: President Donald Trump stated Prime Minister Narendra Modi assured him India is reducing Russian oil purchases. This move aims to help end the Russia-Ukraine war. Trump indicated the tapering would be gradual but completed soon. He also mentioned efforts to encourage China to stop buying Russian oil.

title: Friends over money! Varun’s heartfelt confession - 'I can’t wear a Rs 3 lakh watch'
description: Indian spinner Varun Chakravarthy revealed his internal conflict over spending on luxury items, stemming from a middle-class upbringing.  He confessed to feeling immense guilt over purchasing an expensive watch, believing the money could significantly improve others' lives for generations.  Chakravarthy also shared his discomfort wearing high-value items around friends still facing financial struggles, feeling it disrespectful.

description: External affairs ministry has denied any recent phone call between Prime Minister Modi and US President Trump. This clarification follows Trump's assertion that Modi had promised to halt Russian oil imports. The ministry emphasized that India's energy policy prioritizes national interests and consumer protection through diversified sourcing.

title: Facial nerve damage: Symptoms to watch, causes and prevention tips
description: Facial paralysis, affecting one or both sides of the face, stems from facial nerve damage, causing weakness and movement loss. Bell's palsy is a common sudden cause, while strokes, infections, and tumours can lead to gradual onset. Prompt medical attention is crucial, especially with stroke symptoms, for timely diagnosis and better recovery.

description: Former India coach Ravi Shastri lauded Virat Kohli's exceptional fitness and work ethic, stating it significantly elevated fitness standards across Indian cricket. Shastri highlighted Kohli's relentless dedication, exemplified by his rigorous training even after dismissals, which inspired teammates to improve their own physical conditioning and performance.

description: Karnataka's cabinet has decided to introduce new regulations for Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh activities, including marches and events on government property and public roads.  Information Technology Minister Priyank Kharge stated that permission will be required for such gatherings, emphasizing that organizations cannot operate freely in public spaces. These rules aim to regulate public demonstrations and maintain order.

Taylor Swift’s heartfelt tribute to late friend Jeff Lang leaves his mother in tears
description: Taylor Swift's new song, "Ruin the Friendship," is believed by Jeff Lang's mother to be a tribute to her late son. The track explores themes of regret and unspoken love, with Swift revisiting painful memories. Her fiancé, Travis Kelce, has provided quiet support as she channels her grief through music.

description: Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu vowed Israel's Gaza mission continues until all hostages' remains are recovered, declaring the "fight is not over yet." He rejected genocide accusations, calling the October 7th attack the real atrocity. Netanyahu stressed national unity for achieving war objectives and expanding regional peace, while aid deliveries resumed to Gaza.

AI171 crash: Pilot's father moves SC against 'defective' report; seeks fair probe
description: The father of a pilot involved in the ill-fated Air India flight AI171 crash has approached the Supreme Court seeking a retired judge-monitored probe. The court had previously expressed concerns over the Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau's preliminary report, which indicated potential pilot lapses in the tragedy that claimed 260 lives.

MacKenzie Scott cuts Amazon stake by 42%; now holds $12.6bn; prioritises equity work
description: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

'We don't interfere': Moscow on Trump’s Russian oil claims; calls its supplies vital for India
description: Russian ambassador Denis Alipov on Thursday stated that India's oil import decisions are driven by its national interests, responding to claims by US President Donald Trump. New Delhi has reaffirmed its independent energy sourcing approach, emphasising the importance of Russian oil for its economy and consumer welfare amidst global volatility.

title: Hack of the Day: How to turn your waitlisted ticket into a confirmed one
description: IRCTC's Vikalp feature, or Alternate Train Accommodation Scheme, offers a solution for passengers with waitlisted tickets. This free opt-in service automatically shifts eligible passengers to confirmed seats on alternate trains departing within 12 hours on the same route. Passengers must remember that modifications are not allowed once reassigned, and cancellation charges apply to confirmed Vikalp tickets.

title: Indian student’s experience: OPT to out-of-status; SEVIS delays add confusion
description: Indian students on F-1 OPT face SEVIS termination issues when H-1B petitions are withdrawn. Even with withdrawal before the start date, SEVIS can auto-terminate F-1 status, leaving students out of status. This highlights the need for careful coordination with DSOs and USCIS for timely record correction to maintain legal standing.

title: ‘Anaesthesia of death’: How Bengaluru doctor’s 'cure' killed his dermatologist wife
description: A Bengaluru surgeon stands accused of murdering his wife, a dermatologist, by administering a fatal anaesthetic overdose. Initially ruled an unnatural death, an autopsy report confirmed the presence of Propofol, transforming the case into a cold-blooded murder investigation. The accused allegedly attempted to conceal his wife's death and prevent an autopsy.

title: Dramatic twist: In ASI suicide case, FIR names IPS officer's wife
description: Rohtak police registered an FIR for abetment to suicide and criminal conspiracy against four individuals, including the wife and brother-in-law of deceased IPS officer Y Puran Kumar, following ASI Sandeep Kumar Lather's suicide. Lather accused Kumar of corruption in a final video before his death. The FIR was lodged after Haryana CM Nayab Singh Saini assured justice to Lather's family.

title: Ayesha Curry sparks outrage for flaunting luxury life after ‘9 to 5’ remark
description: Stephen Curry's wife, Ayesha Curry, is facing backlash from fans after a recent Instagram post featuring her playing golf with friends. Critics have accused her of not appreciating her husband and her life, stemming from previous comments on a podcast where she revealed she hadn't initially wanted marriage or children.

title: Introspection mode: Zoho founder to take break; warns of this risk
description: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu is stepping back from external commitments to focus on coding, a move driven by his principle of practicing what he preaches. He aims to complete crucial product development, including end-to-end encryption for Zoho's Arattai messaging app, a feature designed to enhance user data privacy by storing information solely on devices.
